attributes.action: Ensure all staff will legally be paid double time or given a lieu day for all UK bank holidays
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I feel ALL staff whatever their industry should be either paid double time or given a lieu day when they work on a Bank holiday.  Employers benefit from increased sales on Bank holiday days but the staff lose out in many industries.  It is unfair that they work for no extra benefit where staffs in other industry are given Bank holidays off as part of their normal companies’ entitlement.  I feel the playing field should be levelled so all staff benefit from Bank holidays within the UK.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
